name: Lead Generation Form
author: FARAZFRANK

sections.description:
Every single user lead is potential for any business growth.

How Lead Generation Form works?

Go to the plugin dashboard and click on ‘Create New Form’ or go directly to the ‘Form Generator’ menu.
First, type a name for your form.
Use the fields menu on the right sidebar to drag and drop the fields you want into your form.
Configure each field’s settings, such as whether it’s required, its label, help text (tooltip), placeholder text, class, name, value, and type.
Make sure to add a single Submit button to the form.
Once you’ve finished building the form, click the “Save Form” button.
This will save your form and generate a shortcode for it.
Copy the shortcode, which will look like [WLFG id=’7′], and paste it into a new page or post to display your form.

Watch the very easy video tutorial to learn more about: COMING SOON

Free Plugin Features

  • Responsive Design
  • Easy shortcode customization
  • Clone feature
  • Dynamic Form Builder
  • Unlimited Forms Creation
  • Easy Forms Management using Create Update Delete and Clone Actions
  • Form Shortcode
  • Custom Shortcode Parameters like ‘id’, ‘blacklist’, ‘reply_field_name’, and ‘reply_field_email’
  • Copy Form Shortcode Button
  • Simple Drag and Drop Form Builder User Interface
  • Simple Analytics Dashboard
  • Customers Query Management
  • Search And Sort Queries
  • Manage All Customers Leads and Data
  • Download All Customers Query as a Excel Sheet or CSV File
  • From Import and Export
  • Combine Two Form Or Form Merging
  • Google reCaptcha v3
  • Honeypot Spam Bot Protection
  • Email Notification via WP Mail and SMTP
  • Notify Administrator on New Query
  • Blacklist Emails and Domains
  • Form Submit Message To Users
  • Adaptive Form Style From Active Theme
  • Widget Support
  • 100 Leads and Query Display
  • 100 Leads and Query Export as a Excel Sheet or CSV File
  • Support via WordPress Support Forum

Pro Plugin Features

  • Unlimited Leads and Query Capture
  • Unlimited Leads and Query Export as a Excel Sheet or CSV File
  • Faster and Priority Support via Personal Helpdesk

3rd Party Services

  • Google reCAPTCHA v3

We are using Google reCAPTCHA v3 to prevent unauthorized access to the form generated by plugin.
We have setting to configure Google reCAPTCHA v3 by users own credential.

License

This file is part of the plugin.

Lead generation form is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published
by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

Lead generation form is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

Get a copy of the GNU General Public License in http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
sections.installation:
• Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress built-in Add New Plugin installer;
  • Activate the plugin;
  • Navigate to Plugin Settings and fill settings.
sections.faq:
How to install plugin?

  • Download the plugin zip file. Login to you website and go to Plugins > Add New > click on Upload Plugin button and provide the zip file path and hit the Install Now button. After successful installation activate the plugin.

What is the plugin license?

  • GPL license.
sections.changelog:
v1.0.6

  • 17th October 2024
  • Form Submission changed to Ajax
  • Form UI issues fixed
  • Input type range filed added
  • Input field range dynamic value display fixed
  • Prevent resubmit data on page refresh, CTRL+F5, and F5 key pressed fixed
  • Color field posting value fixed
  • Form Generator tooltip and required asterisk UI fixed admin dashboard
  • Form submit message fixed
  • Form field labels copy paste HTML issues (pending)
  • Date field accepting invalid values (pending)
  • Plugin version not displayed in dashboard (pending)
  • Header file label size fix in Form Generator UI (pending)
  • Double shortcode accepting double entries on submit (pending)
  • Submit Button Color CSS accordingly to Form generator issues (pending)
  • Free version restriction message on All Captured Leads page (pending)
  • Copy to clipboard button with shortcode while form creation (upcoming feature)
  • Add a CC email (upcoming feature)
  • Unset field from admin email (upcoming feature)
  • File upload size validation (upcoming feature)
  • Delete associated file record after deleting a record (upcoming feature)

v1.0.5

  • 10th October 2024
  • SMTP setting issue fixed

v1.0.4

  • 4th August 2024
  • Missing sanitization, escaping and validating fixed
  • Used proper wp_json_encode function
  • Translate string with escaping esc_html_e
  • Language file update
  • File upload fixed
  • File filed preview in tabled fixed
  • Query submit message fixed
  • Multi delete leads fixed
  • A default Contact form, ready to add on your website using shortcode [WLFG id=’1′].

v1.0.3

  • Loading icon all captured leads
  • Honeypot method added to protect spam bots and scripts
  • Assets library updated
  • Form generator page CSS fixed
  • Prefix changes to “wlgf”
  • Lead tables records are unresponsive fixed
  • Blacklist Emails and domain parameter added
  • JS and CSS assets loaded properly accordingly guidelines

1.0.2

  • Remove external PHPMailer support and use inbuilt core version
  • Add date and time field in records tables.
  • Import export fix
  • File preview in “All Captured Leads”
  • Custom reply to shortcode parameter ‘reply_name’ and ‘reply_email’

1.0.1

  • Tested through “Plugin Check” plugin
  • Plugin Check: General error fix
  • Plugin Check: Plugin repo error fix
  • Plugin Check: Security error fix

1.0.0

  • First version
  • In case of form filed remove then also remove the colum values from the saved data

short_description: Capture your every visitor query and get connect to fulfil their requirements.

upgrade_notice.1.0.0:
• First version release.
  • Any user feedback appreciated.
  • Deactivate the free version first to activate the pro version fo the plugin.
